name: Full Circle (itch) (Jungle Cat Games)
description:
Try your luck and win a fabulous egg! It's the 87th annual Russian Roulette Gran Prix, and you - alongside your grizzled mentor - are chasing after the ultimate prize. The Gun Egg. The Gegg.

Moves:

-Advance/reverse cylinder: choose a gun to click forward/backward one chamber.

-Respin: randomize your own cylinder again for a luck-boost.

-Swap guns: switch guns with your opponent before firing.

-Sneak a peek: spend some luck to choose a gun and see inside it's cylinder..

-Add a bullet: sacrifice a bunch of luck to slot one more bullet into your opponent's cylinder... but watch out, the opponent may just swap guns with you!

And remember, keeping your luck as high as possible can have some special benefits...

Staff:

Lead Boy - Jack Gurdin

Parallax Master - Miño Smith

Bitchin' Tunes - Sean Campbell

L'Artiste - Abbi Gurdin

Visual-Novel Afficionado - Charlie VanBourgondien

Also There I Guess - Jakob Cordes
